channel.title: Snake on agus sarwono - programming for dummies

item.title: Build your own snake game
item.description:
In this tutorial we will learn how to create a snake game in lua using love2d snake game was one of the nostalic game you ever play,

by the end of this tutorial you will learn to

  • Create a snake
  • Create a food for snake
  • Move the snake

The Classical

I know all af you have played Snake on your Phone, and in this tutorial i will show you as a techie, how to build your simple own snake game
